"A.P.238/4/7": "ARKS's event...? Oh, the one on the monitor earlier? I'm not interested."
"The only thing that interests me... is how to become stronger and wipe out the Darkers."

"Enough power to rival even Dark Falz...
If only I'd had that power..."
"...Tell me. Why did she have to die?"

"Why, why her...
Even though she wasn't talented, she tried her best every single day..."
"And just when her dream was finally coming true..."
"If I wipe out the Darkers, that will be the end of it."
"Yeah, that's it. That's all I can do, so that's what I should do."
"Well, I'll get going. Everyone's taking part in the event, while there's so many more to eliminate..."
